answerText: The Night of the Iguana[10] Tennessee Williams, the author of The Night of the Iguana, also created this character who goes to the apartment of Stanley and Stella Kowalski in A Streetcar Named Desire.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 4 | 5 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The main character of this play causes his tour bus to get delayed when he stops to talk to Maxine Faulk, whose husband Fred has recently died. [10] Name this play in which Hannah Jelkes befriends the protagonist who gets caught by Pedro and Pancho before he can "swim to China" from Mexico.
